summary: The script processes simulation results of contraceptive use, pregnancies and related demographic indicators, generating time‑series plots (total counts and proportions) and cost tables for consumables and interventions up to 2050. It supports comparative visualisation of scenarios with and without interventions, handles heavy calculations for use‑cost tables, and saves the resulting figures and CSV files to an output directory.
business_intent: Enable health planners and researchers to evaluate the impact and financial requirements of contraception programs by providing ready‑to‑use visualisations and cost summaries for different intervention scenarios.
